name: Planet City (Pndx)
description:
Controls:

W = Up 

A = Left

S = Down

D = Right

Space = Skip The Subtitle

Left Click = Select

Right Click = Cancel the selected object

Producers:

Fatih Özer => Coder,Game Designer

Gencer Sarp Mert =>Composer,Coder

Alper Tunga Taşcı =>2D Artist,Composer

Important:This game contains  readymade assets(Walking and collecting material sfx).
